dict.acceptation: 新鲜的；淡水的；新的；无经验的；

sent.orig: Fresh sliced tomatoes, Mozzarella cheese, fresh garlic and fresh basil with Parmesan cheese.
sent.trans: 新鲜蕃茄片、芝士、蒜蓉及新鲜罗勒香叶。

sent.orig: For next year it about creating fresh concepts and fresh solutions by taking a fresh approach.
sent.trans: 这将是一个通过新手段和途径创造新概念、新解决方法的时代。

sent.orig: Seasoning: salt, black pepper, dried herbs, fresh basil, fresh garlic slices, red onion shreds, olive oil.
sent.trans: 调味料：盐，黑椒，乾香草，新鲜罗勒叶，新鲜蒜片，红洋葱碎，橄榄油。

sent.orig: Fresh Coffee, Selection of Teas, Housemade Chocolate Fresh Baked Cookies.
sent.trans: 香浓咖啡，精选茗茶，手工巧克力及主厨烘焙饼乾。

sent.orig: Contrast fresh and frozen vegetables and you'll find the fresh ones taste better.
sent.trans: 把新鲜蔬菜和冰冻蔬菜对比，就会发现新鲜的吃起来味道好。
